title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: In the Properties dialog, on the Info page of the Project Properties, there are text fields instead of labels.
EB: The text fields should be replaced with labels to improve the visual appearance. I believe the text fields were used so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
SR:
1. Open the Properties dialog.
2. Go to the Info page of the Project Properties.
3. Observe that there are text fields instead of labels.
